ygData.subject: RE: Holy Bat Breath!
ygData.msgSnippet: oh man i just realized what happened... Harm hacked the code to make FR not work to validate his findings.  you bastard! Shada
ygData.messageBody:
oh man i just realized what happened... Harm hacked the code to make FR not
work to validate his findings. you bastard!

Shada

>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> tried nagafen since patch? his breath is now outrageously
> powerful, or FR
> doesn't do crap anymore. vox is still the same though. but
> with the same
> crew we routinely take down nag with, we got spanked twice
> (24 ppl). it was
> late and people had to leave, so next day a different group
> of 48+ took him
> down. i think we could do it with 30, but he is definitely
> upgraded or FR
> is bugged.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L38 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
